task.title: Before starting a new theme
task.shortdesc: Before starting to develop a theme or adapt your to fit in this plugins, you need to install the yui compressor on your computer.

context.p: In order to be abble to compress all javascripts and css files

step.cmd: Move the directory into the lib directory of the html5 plugin so the final path of the jar file is: DITA-OT/plugins/org.dita4publishers.html5/libs/yuicompressor-2.4.7/build/yuicompressor-2.4.7.jar

info.p: The html5 plugin has been developped with the yuicompressor version 2.4.7. If you use a different version, you might have to edit the file shared.properties under the lib directory, which tells ant where to find the YUI compressor.

step.cmd: Run a test on your shell:

tutorialinfo.codeblock: shell: cd DITA-OT shell: ./startcmd.sh shell: cd plugins/org.dita4publishers.html5/libs shell: ant -f build.xml
tutorialinfo.p: This steps takes independantly all the css and js defined in the sites/default/default.properties, concatenate them into one style.css and one script.js respectively and compress them using the to style-min.css and script-min.js respectively in the themes/default directory.

step.stepresult: You should see no error in the package.compress execution target.
